s0201: Its winter, Jin extinguished Guo, Guo Gong Chou fled Zhou.
s0202: Returned, attacked extinguished Yu, captured Yu Gong and his grand master Jing Bo Bai Li Xi to send Qin Mu Ji, repaired Yu sacrifices.
s0203: Xun Xi led previously left Yu Qu produce chariot presented to Xian Gong, Xian Gong laughed said: 'Horse then my horse, teeth also old!'
s0205: Twenty-third year, Xian Gong then sent Jia Hua etc. attack Qu, Qu collapsed.
s0207: Ji Rui said: 'Not able, Chong Er already there, now go, Jin must shift troops attack Di, Di fear Jin, calamity will reach.
s0208: Not like flee Liang, Liang near Qin, Qin strong, our lord hundred years after can seek enter.'
s0210: Twenty-fifth year, Jin attacked Di, Di because Chong Er reason, also attacked Jin at Nie Sang, Jin troops dispersed left.
s0211: When this time, Jin strong, west had He Xi, bordered Qin, north bordered Di, east to He Nei.
s0212: Li Ji younger brother gave birth Dao Zi.
s0213: Twenty-sixth year summer, Qi Huan Gong great assembly feudal lords at Kui Qiu.
s0214: Jin Xian Gong ill, traveled after, not arrived, met Zhou steward Kong.
s0215: Steward Kong said: 'Qi Huan Gong increasingly arrogant, not attend virtue attend far strategy, feudal lords not peaceful.
s0216: Lord younger brother not assemble, no harm Jin.'
s0217: Xian Gong also ill, again returned home.
s0218: Ill serious, then told Xun Xi said: 'I with Xi Qi as successor, year young, various ministers not submit, fear disorder rise, you able establish him?'
s0220: Xian Gong said: 'What use as proof?'
s0221: Answered said: 'Make dead revive, living not ashamed, for proof.'
s0222: Then entrusted Xi Qi to Xun Xi.
s0223: Xun Xi as chancellor, main country government.
s0224: Autumn ninth month, Xian Gong died.
s0225: Li Ke, Pi Zheng wished inner Chong Er, with three gong zi followers make disorder, told Xun Xi said: 'Three resentments will rise, Qin, Jin assist them, you will what like?'
s0226: Xun Xi said: 'I not able betray previous lord words.'
s0227: Tenth month, Li Ke killed Xi Qi at mourning place, Xian Gong not buried.
s0228: Xun Xi about die it, someone said not like establish Xi Qi younger brother Dao Zi assist him, Xun Xi established Dao Zi buried Xian Gong.
s0229: Eleventh month, Li Ke assassinated Dao Zi at court, Xun Xi died it.
s0230: Jun Zi said: 'Shi so called 'white gui flaw, still able grind, this words flaw, not able do', its Xun Xi called!
s0232: Initially, Xian Gong about attack Li Rong, divined said 'teeth for calamity'.
s0233: And broke Li Rong, obtained Li Ji, loved her, finally with disorder Jin.
s0234: Li Ke etc. already killed Xi Qi, Dao Zi, sent people welcome gong zi Chong Er from Di, wished establish him.
s0235: Chong Er declined said: 'Bear father command exit flee, father died not able cultivate person son ritual serve mourning, Chong Er what dare enter!
s0236: Grand masters their change establish other son.'
s0237: Returned reported Li Ke, Li Ke sent welcome Yi Wu from Liang.
s0238: Yi Wu wished go, Lu Sheng, Xi Rui said: 'Inner still has gong zi able establish but outside seek, difficult believe.
s0239: Plot not at Qin, assist strong country awe enter, fear dangerous.'
s0240: Then sent Xi Rui thick bribe Qin, agreed said: 'If obtain enter, please with Jin He Xi land give Qin.'
s0241: And sent Li Ke letter said: 'Truly obtain establish, please then enfeoff son at Fen Yang city.'
s0242: Qin Mu Gong then sent troops sent Yi Wu to Jin.
s0243: Qi Huan Gong heard Jin inner disorder, also led feudal lords like Jin.
s0244: Qin troops with Yi Wu also arrived Jin, Qi then sent Xi Peng assemble Qin together enter Yi Wu, established as Jin lord, this was Hui Gong.
s0245: Qi Huan Gong to Jin Gao Liang returned home.
s0246: Hui Gong Yi Wu first year, sent Pi Zheng thank Qin said: 'Initially Yi Wu with He Xi land permitted lord, now fortunately obtained enter establish.
s0247: Ministers said: 'Land previous lord land, lord perished outside, what with obtain monopolize permit Qin?'
s0248: I contended it not able obtain, so thank Qin.'
s0249: Also not gave Li Ke Fen Yang city, robbed his authority.
s0250: Fourth month, Zhou Xiang Wang sent Zhou Gong Ji Fu assemble Qi, Qin grand masters together ritual Jin Hui Gong.
